methods.name: Screen
methods.summary: Screen preset (budgeted decode for UI capture scenarios).

methods.name: Balanced
methods.summary: Balanced preset (good default for most images).

methods.name: Stylized
methods.summary: Stylized preset (adds aggressive sampling for QR art).

methods.name: IncludeBarcodeResults
methods.summary: Include 1D barcode results when decoding multiple symbols.

methods.name: WithCancellation
methods.summary: Sets a cancellation token for decoding.

methods.name: WithQrBudget
methods.summary: Applies a QR decode budget (milliseconds + optional max dimension).

methods.name: WithImageBudget
methods.summary: Applies a non-QR image decode budget (milliseconds + optional max dimension).

methods.name: WithQrProfile
methods.summary: Sets the QR profile for this decode.

properties.name: ExpectedBarcode
properties.summary: Expected barcode type (optional hint for 1D decoding).

properties.name: Code39Checksum
properties.summary: Controls how Code39 checksum characters are handled during decode.

properties.name: MsiChecksum
properties.summary: Controls how MSI checksum digits are handled during decode.

properties.name: Code11Checksum
properties.summary: Controls how Code 11 checksum characters are handled during decode.

properties.name: PlesseyChecksum
properties.summary: Controls whether Plessey CRC validation is required during decode.

properties.name: IncludeBarcode
properties.summary: Include 1D barcode results when decoding multiple symbols.

properties.name: Image
properties.summary: Image decode options for non-QR symbols.

properties.name: Profile
properties.summary: Speed/accuracy profile for QR pixel decoding (default: Robust).

properties.name: MaxDimension
properties.summary: Maximum dimension (pixels) for QR decoding. Larger inputs will be downscaled by sampling. Set to 0 to disable.

properties.name: MaxScale
properties.summary: Maximum scale to try when decoding QR (1..8). Set to 0 to use profile defaults.

properties.name: MaxMilliseconds
properties.summary: Maximum milliseconds to spend decoding QR (best effort). Set to 0 to disable.

properties.name: DisableTransforms
properties.summary: Disable rotation/mirroring attempts for QR decoding, even in robust profiles.

properties.name: AggressiveSampling
properties.summary: Enables extra thresholding/sampling passes for stylized or noisy QR codes (slower).

properties.name: MaxImageDimension
properties.summary: Maximum image dimension (pixels) for non-QR decoding. Larger inputs will be downscaled. Set to 0 to disable.

properties.name: MaxImageMilliseconds
properties.summary: Maximum milliseconds to spend decoding non-QR symbols (best effort). Set to 0 to disable.
